requirement_tested: A student panel with authentication and authorization
user_persona: A college junior named Alex looking for summer internship opportunities.
user_goal: To log into the student panel and access the dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting the Site
narrative_steps.description: Alex visits the internship portal homepage and sees the option to log in.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Login' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A login form with email and password fields appears.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Credentials
narrative_steps.description: Alex enters his registered email and password into the form.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in valid email and password, then click Submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system authenticates Alex and redirects him to the student dashboard.

requirement_tested: A company panel with authentication and authorization
user_persona: HR manager Sarah from TechCorp wanting to post new internship openings.
user_goal: To log into the company panel to manage internship listings.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Login Page
narrative_steps.description: Sarah navigates to the site and selects the login option.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Login' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A login form is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Sarah fills in her company credentials and submits them.
narrative_steps.action: Enter valid company email and password, then click Submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: She is redirected to the company dashboard where she can manage internships.

requirement_tested: Internship browsing and search functionality for students
user_persona: Alex, a computer science student searching for remote internships.
user_goal: Find remote internships with a minimum stipend of $500.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Internships
narrative_steps.description: After logging in, Alex goes to the Browse Internships section.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the internship browsing page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A grid of internship cards is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Filtering Results
narrative_steps.description: Alex uses the filters to find remote internships with a stipend of at least $500.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Remote' from location dropdown and adjust stipend slider to $500.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The list updates automatically to show only matching internships.

user_persona: Alex finds an interesting internship and decides to apply.
user_goal: Submit an application for a software development internship.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Application Form
narrative_steps.description: Alex clicks on the 'Apply' button for a suitable internship listing.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Apply' button on an internship card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An application modal with cover letter and resume upload fields opens.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Application
narrative_steps.description: Alex writes a cover letter and uploads his resume before submitting.
narrative_steps.action: Write a cover letter, upload resume file, and click 'Submit Application'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The application is submitted successfully and confirmation is shown.

user_persona: Sarah wants to add a new internship opportunity for her company.
user_goal: Post a new internship listing for a data analyst position.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating New Post
narrative_steps.description: Sarah logs into the company panel and looks for the option to post an internship.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Post Internship' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A form with internship details fields is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Filling and Submitting Form
narrative_steps.description: Sarah fills out all required fields for the new internship and submits it.
narrative_steps.action: Complete all form fields and click 'Post Internship'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The new internship is created and appears in the company's listings.

requirement_tested: User profiles for both students and companies
user_persona: Alex needs to update his university information in his profile.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Profile
narrative_steps.description: Alex navigates to his profile page from the main menu.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Profile' in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: His current profile information is displayed in read-only mode.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Information
narrative_steps.description: Alex clicks the edit button and updates his university name.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Edit Profile', change university field, and save changes.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: His updated profile information is saved and reflected immediately.

requirement_tested: Responsive design optimized for speed and user experience
user_persona: Alex is using his tablet while commuting to review internship listings.
user_goal: Easily browse internships on a mobile device without performance issues.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Portal on Tablet
narrative_steps.description: Alex opens the internship portal website on his tablet.
narrative_steps.action: Open the website on a tablet-sized screen.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The layout adjusts responsively to fit the tablet screen size.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Content
narrative_steps.description: He scrolls through internship listings which load quickly even with images.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll down the list of internships.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Images and content load smoothly without noticeable delay.

requirement_tested: Navigation menu with links to key sections
user_persona: Sarah frequently switches between managing internships and viewing her profile.
user_goal: Quickly navigate between different parts of the company panel.

narrative_steps.title: Using Navigation Menu
narrative_steps.description: While logged in, Sarah uses the top navigation bar to switch sections.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'My Listings' in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: She is taken to the My Listings page instantly.

narrative_steps.title: Switching Sections
narrative_steps.description: Sarah then moves to her profile page using the same menu.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Profile' in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Her profile page loads without requiring another login.

requirement_tested: Backend API to serve dynamic data to the frontend
user_persona: Developer testing integration between frontend and backend systems.
user_goal: Verify that internship listings are fetched dynamically from the backend.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Internship Data
narrative_steps.description: When visiting the internship browsing page, data should come from backend API.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the internship browsing page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Internship listings are loaded via GET request to /api/internships endpoint.

requirement_tested: Frontend fetching all data dynamically from backend APIs
user_persona: Alex checks his recently submitted applications after applying to several positions.
user_goal: View real-time updates of his application statuses.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Applications
narrative_steps.description: Alex navigates to the My Applications section to see his submissions.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'My Applications' in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Applications are fetched dynamically from /api/applications endpoint.

requirement_tested: PostgreSQL database connection using specified environment variables
user_goal: Confirm that the backend service connects properly to PostgreSQL.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Service
narrative_steps.description: The backend server starts up and attempts to connect to PostgreSQL.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend service with correct environment variables set.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Service establishes connection to PostgreSQL at localhost:5432 using myappuser credentials.

requirement_tested: Repository package.json configured with install:all and dev scripts
user_persona: New developer joining the team setting up the local development environment.
user_goal: Install dependencies and start both frontend and backend servers easily.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: The developer runs the command to install all project dependencies.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run install:all` from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dependencies for both frontend and backend are installed simultaneously.

narrative_steps.title: Running Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Once setup is done, the developer starts both servers for development work.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend services start concurrently in watch mode.

requirement_tested: Mint cream background color applied throughout the site
user_persona: UX designer reviewing visual consistency across the platform.
user_goal: Ensure the entire site has a uniform mint cream background.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Homepage Background
narrative_steps.description: The designer inspects the background color of the homepage visually and in code.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the homepage and inspect body element style.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Body element has background-color: mintcream applied consistently.

requirement_tested: Teal color scheme for all UI components
user_persona: Alex interacts with various buttons and cards during his session.
user_goal: Experience a consistent teal-themed interface throughout the site.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with Buttons
narrative_steps.description: As Alex browses, he notices that all buttons use shades of teal.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over multiple buttons across different pages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Buttons display teal colors and darken slightly on hover as per design.

requirement_tested: Role-based access control for student and company panels
user_persona: Alex accidentally tries to access the company-only section.
user_goal: Be prevented from accessing unauthorized areas of the site.

narrative_steps.title: Attempting Unauthorized Access
narrative_steps.description: Alex manually types a URL that leads to the company panel while logged in as a student.
narrative_steps.action: Try to navigate directly to '/company/dashboard' URL.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Access is denied and Alex is redirected to his own dashboard or login page.
